mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_no, regdate, id, content, like_cnt, del_flag) VALUES (post_post_no_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{id}, #{content}, 0, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post p, img i WHERE p.post_no = i.post_no AND p.id = #{id} AND i.img_no IN (SELECT MIN(img_no) FROM img GROUP BY post_no) ORDER BY p.post_no DESC

SELECT p.id, p.post_no, p.content, i.img_name, pf.profile_name FROM post p, img i, member m, profile pf WHERE p.post_no=i.post_no AND p.id = m.id AND m.profile_no = pf.profile_no AND p.post_no=#{post_no}
